phrases: Hey, all you viewers out there!
When you are watchin' Fairy Tail, make sure to keep the room nice and bright,
and sit back from the screen,'kay?
Our guild was attacked by the official guild Phantom Lord.
Tail has never gotten along well with them, but...
They beat up Levy's team and kidnapped Lucy!
That is right, we can do it!
Let us go for even more who-knows-what!!
The door to mystery is right in front of us
This excitement gets my heart racing
Why cannot I see tomorrow, I wonder?
The only part leveling up is my curiosity
We cannot just throw away our daily life together, right?
Living itself will be our training!
Let us search for even more who-knows-what!
We cannot be satisfied with just the normal answers
We will do our best living our life
If you are a man, then you are a Man!
The one who absorbs the power of monsters he defeats into his arm...
He even took out his own guildmates in that hit!
The Iron Dragon Slayer, Gajeel the Great, will face you now.
Maybe I am trash, but I am a Man!
Where do you think you are lookin'?
I have never seen that before...
I am Fairy Tail's Dragon Slayer.
Elfman, give this guy to me.
Not only do you use me as a floor mat,
you plan on interfering in our Man-on-Man battle?
This guy busted up the guild and hurt Levy and the others...
Ooh, they are having fun, are not they?
I will let you have that manly battle!
Does not look like that to me.
You are not affected either, right?
You know me pretty good there...
You are one hot and uncomfortable guy, you know that?
Do not get ahead of yourself, you scrap-iron bastard!
That is some decent power you got there.
Is that all you got, Salamander?
Got a bit of a destructive streak in you, huh?
No one can stop him now.
That is the Man, Master Makarov!
As long as our master is here, we cannot lose!
What is the meaning of this?
It has been a while, Makarov-san.
Not since the regular meeting six years ago?
I am afraid I made a fool of myself then.
I did not come here to chat, Jose!
A battle between two of the 10 Great Wizard Saints would surely because a cataclysm.
I would prefer a simple, sensible victory.
Come and fight me fair and square!
Even though she is part of your own guild?
You are saying you have no idea who Lucy Heartfilia-sama is?
I never sensed this guy's presence!
Where does this sadness come from?
Is it the sadness of a great wizard disappearing?
My power... I have lost my power!
This is the magic of one of the Element 4, Aria-san of the Heavens.
He can empty his opponent of magic.
In other words, his magic is to nullify.
This battle is already mine, would not you say?
I cannot sense any magical power at all from him!
You mean he is now nothing but a little old man?
And right when things were heating up.
What the hell do they have up there?
They are at less than half strength now!
And we have still got Gajeel and the Element 4!
You got to do better than that!
Do not force yourself at your age!
I can see where this is going.
It is not just about attacking strength...
Our moral is critically low as well.
You have got to be kidding me!
I can fight as well, Erza!
Without the master, we cannot defeat Jose!
Already running with your tails between your legs?
You never had the guts, you Fairies.
You are always creeping me out.
But anyway, good job getting the old man.
It was all Master Jose's plan.
Do not cry at every little thing!
The girl named Lucy is being held in our headquarters.
We will finish this one day, Salamander!
You think I would retreat now?
I am here to get revenge for Levy's team!
All we can do now... is pull back...
The hole the master left is too great!
It is Salamander... and a cat!
You and me are going to talk!
Natsu, what are you going to do?
I am going to save Lucy, obviously.
I do not know nothing, seriously!
If any more of my friends are hurt...
You will be nothing but a pile of ashes...
I never heard of the wench!
I mean, I do not know about the young lady!
Time to make charcoal, I guess.
But our headquarters is up ahead.
Say that in the first place, sheesh.
I am the guild master of Phantom Lord, Jose.
I was captured by the Element 4!
I know that this filthy cell and shackles are quite rude of me,
but you are you currently a prisoner, so I hope you understand the circumstances.
How dare you do that to Levy-chan's team!
What is that supposed to mean?
You do not want to stay in this cell, yes?
If you cooperate, I will transfer you to the suite.
Oh, are you referring to Fairy Tail?
Our true objective was to obtain a certain someone.
And that someone just happened to be in Fairy Tail, so we crushed it on our way...
You are much denser than I figured the daughter of the Heartfilia family would be.
The Daughter of the Heartfilia Konzern, Mistress Lucy.
It seems you hid this fact from the people of the guild.
Why would the daughter of one of the wealthiest families in the country
take on such cheap, dangerous jobs?
We were requested to bring you back with us.
By none other than your father himself.
I am sure it is because he wanted to search for his beloved daughter who ran away from home.
He is not the kind of person that would care about that!
I am never going back, you hear me?
I am not going back to that house!
What a troublesome little lady we have ourselves.
I kind of need to go to the bathroom.
That is the oldest trick in the book.
There are plenty of ways to deal with that old trick.
I have never seen such an improper lady!
It is best not to underestimate the old tricks!
You did me a good one there...
I am going to punish you.
I must show you how scary Phantom can be!
He is here, I know it!
Lucys are falling from the sky!
You are nuts, you know that?
Natsu... I thought you were here...
Let us go back to the guild.
I are not afraid of them at all!
I will pay'them back for that too!
You cannot handle it by yourself, Natsu.
Because he is an old geezer!
But, I still want to be in the guild...
Sure you can be in the guild.
Do not pull her so much.
Then I will carry you on my back,'kay?
Now you are making Natsu cry!
Now you have gone and done it, girly!
chasing after your profile left only in my revolving dreams
You said, I never want to see your face again, when you left me
But the tears on your cheek said it all
Every time you felt like you would be swallowed up in the waves of contradiction
you always held back your tears, you know?
What a strong person, they said, but everyone overestimated you
and before you knew it you lost sight of who you really are
Then the sun I thought would always be near me collapsed
Rubbing out the truths and the lies of one day, altogether
still, ironically, chasing after your profile in my revolving dreams
It is way past the time we were going to meet.
But my stomach told me this was just about the right time.
You tell time by your stomach?
I am pretty peaked, let us get something to eat!
